description.text: This thick iron torc appears crudely made, and a few dents from the maker's hammer are visible. Once per day as a free action, the wearer can enter a rage for 6 rounds as the spell, except that the wearer is fatigued for 12 rounds after the rage ends. If the wearer has the rage class feature, once per day as a free action the wearer can grant herself 3 additional rounds of rage instead.
